name: react-query-rewind
description: React Query Rewind is a library that helps developers debug applications that use React Query (ie TanStack Query) by letting them time travel through state changes directly in their chrome dev tools

scripts.install-example: cd example && npm i && npm run install
scripts.link-package: npm link && (cd example/client && npm link react-query-rewind)
scripts.unlink-package: (cd example/client && npm unlink react-query-rewind) && npm unlink
scripts.package-setup-1: npm i && npm run install-example && npm run link-dependencies && npm run watch
scripts.package-setup-2: npm run link-package && npm run example
scripts.link-package-algolia: npm link && (cd react-examples-tanstack/algolia && npm link react-query-rewind)
scripts.unlink-package-algolia: (cd react-examples-tanstack/algolia && npm unlink react-query-rewind) && npm unlink
scripts.package-setup-1-algolia: npm i && npm run install-algolia && npm run link-dependencies-algolia && npm run watch
scripts.package-setup-2-algolia: npm run link-package-algolia && (cd react-examples-tanstack/algolia && npm run dev)
scripts.link-package-basic: npm link && (cd react-examples-tanstack/basic && npm link react-query-rewind)
scripts.unlink-package-basic: (cd react-examples-tanstack/basic && npm unlink react-query-rewind) && npm unlink
scripts.package-setup-1-basic: npm i && npm run install-basic && npm run link-dependencies-basic && npm run watch
scripts.package-setup-2-basic: npm run link-package-basic && (cd react-examples-tanstack/basic && npm run dev)
scripts.link-package-basic-typescript: npm link && (cd react-examples-tanstack/basic-typescript && npm link react-query-rewind)
scripts.unlink-package-basic-typescript: (cd react-examples-tanstack/basic-typescript && npm unlink react-query-rewind) && npm unlink
scripts.package-setup-1-basic-typescript: npm i && npm run install-basic-typescript && npm run link-dependencies-basic-typescript && npm run watch
scripts.package-setup-2-basic-typescript: npm run link-package-basic-typescript && (cd react-examples-tanstack/basic-typescript && npm run dev)
scripts.link-package-pagination: npm link && (cd react-examples-tanstack/pagination && npm link react-query-rewind)
scripts.unlink-package-pagination: (cd react-examples-tanstack/pagination && npm unlink react-query-rewind) && npm unlink
scripts.package-setup-1-pagination: npm i && npm run install-pagination && npm run link-dependencies-pagination && npm run watch
scripts.package-setup-2-pagination: npm run link-package-pagination && (cd react-examples-tanstack/pagination && npm run dev)
